Text:
How do we boot from disk(fresh install) and reformat the computer once we downloaded this?? 
I am able to upgrade but not boot from disk

please help

How To Install Windows 7 Or Windows 8 From USB Drive.
http://www.intowindows.com/how-to-install-windows-7vista-from-usb-drive-detailed-100-working-guide/
Works 100%

Works 100%

You can do a clean installation this way:
- burn a DVD with the iso file you downloaded
- restart your PC and when "boot from DVD drive" appears on the screen press ENTER
- follow the indications and do NOT eject the DVD from the drive until ALL installation process ends
- Your HD will be wiped out and a partition alternatives will be offered to you.

Note: A Windows.old folder will be created on your HD containing all your old windows files. You can delete this folder if you need to save HD space. You will be warned to not delete some few old windows files.
